message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob! It's a fair start.
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more after all the hard work I've put in!
You think you deserve more just because of hard work? I'm not convinced. I'll make a new offer in Round 3!
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise.
I'm not getting any younger, I need a bigger share to secure my future!
You're not getting any younger, but I'm not getting any poorer either! I'll make a new offer in Round 5.
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fair compromise. Let's make a deal!
I'm starting to get a little desperate, but I still think I deserve more!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not getting any more generous! I'll make a new offer in Round 7.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my final offer!
